game.name: Basketboy's Adventure
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Sports
game.shortDescription: 바스켓보이즈 어드벤처에서 탐험하고, 수집하고, 싸우세요! 생동감 넘치는 손그림 세미 오픈 월드 ‘구구시티’를 무대로 이야기를 발견하고 숨겨진 비밀을 찾아보세요. 수십 가지 스킬과 재능을 익히고, 강력한 펫과 유대감을 쌓으며, 장대한 전투에 대비하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore, collect, and fight in Basketboy's Adventure! Uncover stories and hidden secrets across the vibrant, hand-drawn semi-open world of Gugu City. Master dozens of skills and talents, bond with powerful pets, and gear up for an epic battle!

reviewHighlights.text: This is a very janky game. The English is really poor, and the game has way too much dialogue to let it slide. A lot of detail text is untranslated, s...
